Package org.apache.cocoon.util.log

LogKit related utilities.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CocoonLogFormatter An extended pattern formatter.
CocoonLogFormatter.CallStack Hack to get the call stack as an array of classes.
CocoonTargetFactory CocoonTargetFactory class.
ExtensiblePatternFormatter A refactoring of org.apache.log.format.PatternFormatter that can be extended.
ExtensiblePatternFormatter.PatternRun  
XMLCocoonLogFormatter A refactoring of org.apache.log.format.PatternFormatter and org.apache.cocoon.util.log.CocoonLogFormatter for producing XML format.
XMLCocoonLogFormatter.CallStack Hack to get the call stack as an array of classes.
 

Package org.apache.cocoon.util.log Description

LogKit related utilities.
